synopsis:
We met and shared one death in two lifes - What’s beyond the end of the horizon? Death… hope… freedom… … A girl has born with the secret to the end. She... is not allowed to live freely. "Freedom" was just a word she yearns for. She lived in a closed and narrow world. Her life is chosen by someone. Therefore, she thought, if the God only gives me scenario with no freedom, I want to share the "death" with you, not that "someone". I want to give the half of destiny to her, even if I have to share the "death" with her.

(Source: MAL News)
